pages.text: Spell Tomes are special books that contain the knowledge to learn a spell. To learn a spell simply use the spell to tome. A player can learn as many spells as they want, but only spells matching the element of their $(l:archon:spells/wands)wand$() can be casted.

Tomes can be crafted using a scripture table or found in different structures. The scripture table requires 3 ingredients, lapis lazuli, and a book to write a spell. Recipes can be viewed using REI or a similar mod.
